faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 via email and chat at support@yoursaas.com. Phone support is available Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM EST (excluding federal holidays). Enterprise customers have access to 24/7 priority phone support with a guaranteed 15-minute response time. For urgent issues outside regular business hours, Enterprise customers can use our emergency escalation line, or all users can submit a high-priority ticket through the account dashboard.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team through: 1) Live chat in your dashboard (24/7), 2) Email at support@yoursaas.com (24/7 response within 4 hours), 3) Phone at 1-800-YOUR-SAAS (Mon-Fri 9AM-6PM EST), 4) Support ticket system in Settings > Help & Support. Response times: Basic plan (4-24 hours), Professional (2-4 hours), Enterprise (15 minutes priority).

faqs.question: Where can I find your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: Our complete privacy policy is available at yoursaas.com/privacy. Key points: We never sell your data, we use industry-standard encryption, we're GDPR and CCPA compliant, and you can request data deletion at any time. For specific privacy questions, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@yoursaas.com.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. To request a refund within 30 days of signup, contact support with your account details. After 30 days, refunds are not available for partial subscription periods, but you can cancel anytime and retain access until the end of your paid period. Enterprise contracts may have different terms.

faqs.question: Do you have an SLA?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our Service Level Agreement guarantees: 1) 99.9% uptime for Professional and Enterprise plans (99.5% for Basic), 2) Scheduled maintenance windows announced 7 days in advance, 3) Response time commitments based on plan tier, 4) Service credits for downtime exceeding SLA thresholds. Full SLA details are available at yoursaas.com/sla or in your Enterprise contract.
